message: Hello Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs. This product has been meticulously designed to exceed expectations and deliver exceptional results. Considering its high quality and unique features, we are confident it will be a valuable asset to you. We are offering this product to you for $15000. We believe this price reflects the superior value and benefits it offers. We look forward to hearing your thoughts on this offer.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the quality and features of your product. However, I'm looking to stay within a budget of $12000. Would it be possible for us to negotiate closer to that price?
